mapper.select: SELECT A.ASSET_NO, A.ASSET_NAME, R.RESERV_NO, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, H.EMP_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN ASSET A ON R.ASSET_NO = A.ASSET_NO JOIN HR H ON H.EMP_NO = R.EMP_NO WHERE A.ASSET_TYPE = #{type} AND R.START_TIME > #{targetDate} AND R.END_TIME < (#{targetDate} + 1)
SELECT APPROVAL FROM ASSET WHERE ASSET_NO = #{assetNo}

SELECT R.RESERV_NO, R.ASSET_NO, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.REASON, R.STATUS, A.ASSET_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN ASSET A ON R.ASSET_NO = A.ASSET_NO WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND ASSET_TYPE = #{assetType} AND R.END_TIME > SYSDATE ORDER BY R.START_TIME

SELECT R.RESERV_NO, A.ASSET_NAME, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.REASON, R.STATUS, H.EMP_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN ASSET A ON R.ASSET_NO = A.ASSET_NO JOIN HR H ON H.EMP_NO = R.EMP_NO WHERE A.ASSET_TYPE = #{type} AND R.END_TIME > SYSDATE ORDER BY R.RESERV_NO
